summary: It all started with the first wine sip Giovanni Cuttin had in his life. A Marzemino, a wine mentioned by Lorenzo da Ponte in his libretto for Mozart's Don Giovanni. Since then, the shy ... See full summary Â»
cast: Vincenzo Amato|Pietro Sermonti|Daniela Virgilio|Giovanna Mezzogiorno|Lambert Wilson|Gioele Dix|Erika Blanc|Paolo Giovannucci|Giovanni Visentin|Franco Trevisi|Stefano Cassetti|Gianmaria Martini|Vincenzo Zampa|Veronica Gentili|Annalena Lombardi|Tom Angel Kharumaty|Georgia Luzi|Luciano Mallozzi|Marina Nocilla|Alessandro Vicentini Orgnani|Maurizio Raffaelli
title: Vinodentro
